name: Project Turf War x64
description:
Monsters destroy a city and fight for territory.

Player vs CPU combat and city destruction!

Controls

R - Restart

Esc - Quit Game

WASD - Move

Shift - While climbing, deal damage to buildings (side or front. While on the ground, Melee attack

Shift (Hold and Release) - While on the ground, Ranged attack

Spacebar- While climbing, climb faster. While on the ground, Dodge Roll

CTRL - While climbing, release grip and fall
